Query.Sql: select Primary_Diagnosis, replace(NHS_Number, ' ', '') as NHS_Number, min(Administration_Date) as Administration_Date from omop_staging.sact_staging group by Primary_Diagnosis, NHS_Number order by NHS_Number, Primary_Diagnosis, min(Administration_Date)

Explanation.Description: PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD AT START SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) is the PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD) at the start of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy.
Explanation.Origin: PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD AT START SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY)

Explanation.Description: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY ADMINISTRATION DATE is the date of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration or the date an oral drug was initially dispensed to the PATIENT.
